report.title: Species & Occurrence Counts by Survey
report.description: Lists surveys and the number of species and occurrences within them. Optional date range and taxon group filters
report.query: SELECT su.title as survey, count(DISTINCT ttl.taxon_meaning_id) as species_count, count(DISTINCT o.id) as occurrences_count, #website_id# as website_id FROM occurrences o JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttl ON o.taxa_taxon_list_id = ttl.id and ttl.deleted=false JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttl2 ON ttl2.taxon_meaning_id=ttl.taxon_meaning_id and ttl2.preferred='t' and ttl2.deleted=false JOIN taxa t ON ttl2.taxon_id = t.id and t.deleted=false JOIN samples s on s.id=o.sample_id and s.deleted=false JOIN surveys su on su.id=s.survey_id and su.deleted=false WHERE o.website_id=#website_id# AND o.deleted=false AND (CAST(t.taxon_group_id AS character varying)='#taxon_group_id#' OR '#taxon_group_id#'='') AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR s.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR s.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) GROUP BY survey UNION SELECT 'Total' as survey, count(DISTINCT ttl.taxon_meaning_id) as species_count, count(DISTINCT o.id) as occurrences_count, #website_id# as website_id FROM occurrences o JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttl ON o.taxa_taxon_list_id = ttl.id AND ttl.deleted=false JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttl2 ON ttl2.taxon_meaning_id=ttl.taxon_meaning_id and ttl2.preferred='t' AND ttl2.deleted=false JOIN taxa t ON ttl2.taxon_id = t.id AND t.deleted=false JOIN samples s on s.id=o.sample_id and s.deleted=false WHERE o.website_id=#website_id# AND o.deleted=false AND (CAST(t.taxon_group_id AS character varying)='#taxon_group_id#' OR '#taxon_group_id#'='') AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR s.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR s.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND '#include_total#'!='no'

param.name: website_id
param.description: Select the website to return data for

param.name: taxon_group_id
param.description: Select the taxon group to return data for, or leave for all groups
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM taxon_groups
